title: Cloud & DevOps
description: Master cloud computing with the AWS Solution Architect course, designed for beginners and professionals. Learn to design, implement, and manage scalable systems on AWS through expert-led training and hands-on projects. This comprehensive course covers core AWS services, architecture best practices, and security. Earn your certification with the AWS Solution Architect course and advance your career in cloud technology.
learnList: AWS Fundamentals: Cloud computing concepts and the breadth of AWS services.
Core Services Mastery: Deep dive into key infrastructure and API services (EC2, S3, IAM, RDS, Lambda, etc.).
Networking & Security: Building secure, scalable Virtual Private Clouds (VPCs).
Storage Solutions: Utilizing S3, Glacier, and EBS for various needs.
Database Management: Working with relational (RDS) and NoSQL (DynamoDB) databases, and Redshift.
Scaling & Monitoring: Implementing Auto-Scaling, Load Balancing, and CloudWatch.
Cloud Architecture: Principles for building fault-tolerant and cost-optimized solutions on AWS.
